about_the_game:
[About the game]
All text in this game was translated by machine translation.

[About the DLC.]

This DLC content is an additional episode of "Sister X Slaves".
In order to play this DLC, you must have the full version of "Sister X Slaves" installed on your computer.


[Story]
The protagonist, Naoki, accepts a deal with Mio, the direct perpetrator.
At first, Mio feels responsible and sacrifices herself, but gradually she can no longer stand it.
Now Naoki offers Mio a certain deal: ......


[CHARACTER]


A spoiled college student aspiring to be an announcer

Name: Mio Segasaki
Height: 159cm
Three sizes：B103 (I cup)/W57/H88
Characteristics: Attracting attention, traveling, eating out

　He is the one who pulled the protagonist in his car at the beginning of the story. In fact, he has received a job offer as a TV announcer, In order to cover it up, he hides the protagonist in the apartment where they live with the help of his sister Mao. However, he is the perpetrator of the accident, but he is still a victim of the accident. However, even though she is the perpetrator of the accident, she has a blatant dislike for the protagonist, and is uncomfortable with him. She repeatedly makes him feel uncomfortable, and this brings him to his senses.
He sees his sister being humiliated by the protagonist and asks him about it. ......

Japanese voice recording （※Male characters are not recorded)


◆Game Specifications◆
Novel game that can be read by clicking.
Heroine full voice
CG mode
Scene recollection



◆Content warning◆
This game contains content not suitable for all ages and
may not be suitable for display in the workplace.

Games contain nudity or sexual content, violence, sexual assault, sex without consent, and general adult content.
